definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="energy">energy</variable><variable type="String" id="txt">txt</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:energy</field><value name="VAL"><block type="block_energy_get"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment pinned="false" h="52" w="289">This gets the coordinates of the provided entity, then prints the coordinates in the action bar.</comment><value name="text"><block type="text_join" inline="true"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:energy</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
